privileged.title: Privileged
privileged.description: Indicates if the entitlement is privileged

cloudGoverned.title: Cloud Governed
cloudGoverned.description: Indicates if the entitlement is cloud governed

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: The identity that owns the entitlement

name.title: The display name of the identity

sourceName.title: Source Name
sourceName.description: The display name of the source this account belongs to

cloudLifecycleState.title: Cloud Lifecycle State
cloudLifecycleState.description: The lifecycle state of the identity this account is correlated to

identityState.title: Identity State
identityState.description: The identity state of the identity this account is correlated to

connectionType.title: Connection Type
connectionType.description: The connection type of the source this account is from

isMachine.title: Is Machine
isMachine.description: Indicates if the account is of machine type

authoritative.title: Authoritative
authoritative.description: Indicates if this account is from an authoritative source

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Indicates if the account is currently disabled

locked.title: Locked
locked.description: Indicates if the account is currently locked

nativeIdentity.title: Native Identity
nativeIdentity.description: The unique ID of the account generated by the source system

systemAccount.title: System Account
systemAccount.description: If true, this is a user account within IdentityNow

uncorrelated.title: Uncorrelated
uncorrelated.description: Indicates if this account is not correlated to an identity

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: The unique ID of the account

manuallyCorrelated.title: Manually Correlated
manuallyCorrelated.description: Indicates if the account has been manually correlated to an identity

hasEntitlements.title: Has Entitlements
hasEntitlements.description: Indicates if the account has entitlements

features.title: Features
features.description: A string list containing the owning source's features

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: The origin of the account either aggregated or provisioned

identity.title: Identity
identity.description: The identity this account is correlated to

source.title: Source
source.description: The source system this account belongs to

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: The entitlements assigned to this account

created.title: Created
created.description: Date and time when the access profile was created

modified.title: Modified
modified.description: Date and time when the access profile was last modified

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Indicates whether the access profile is enabled

requestable.title: Requestable
requestable.description: Indicates whether the access profile is requestable by access request

segments.title: Segments
segments.description: List of segment IDs that the access profile is assigned to

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: The identity that owns this access profile

source.title: Source
source.description: The source system this access profile belongs to

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.description: The entitlements grouped by this access profile
